resources.string: Plastic bottles are primarily made of Polyethylene Terephthalate (PET). The average time for a plastic bottle to completely degrade is at least 450 years. Some bottles can even take 1000 years to biodegrade!

1) Rinse the bottle with water and let dry. 
2) Remove any plastic labels or wrappings. 
3) With the cap on, twist and compress the bottle. 
4) Dispose in a plastics recycling bin.
